title: What Happened To The Middle With Paul Krugman
description: If you had to name the most famous living economist, it would be hard to come up with anyone other than Paul Krugman. On this episode, Kate and Luigi talk with Krugman about his new book "Arguing with Zombies: Economics, Politics, and the Fight for a Better Future", why he thinks America's economy has failed the middle class, and how we can create a better economic future for our children.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
